statementlist.statement: SELECT student.id as student_id, class.id as class_id, class.name AS class_name, student.firstname, student.surname, student.exit_date, book.title, borrows.begindate FROM student LEFT JOIN student_school_term ON student_school_term.student_id = student.id AND student_school_term.school_term_id = :school_term_id LEFT JOIN class ON student_school_term.class_id = class.id LEFT JOIN borrows ON borrows.student_id = student.id AND borrows.return_date IS NULL LEFT JOIN book_copy ON borrows.book_copy_id = book_copy.id LEFT JOIN book ON book_copy.book_id = book.id WHERE student.school_id = :school_id and student.id IN :ids order by class_name, student.surname, student.firstname, book.title
